encyclopedia.title: Swartkorhaan
encyclopedia.fact: A ground-dwelling bird known for its striking black and white plumage.

encyclopedia.title: Swartkopreier
encyclopedia.fact: Tall wading bird often seen stalking in wetlands.

encyclopedia.title: Blouvalk
encyclopedia.fact: This raptor hunts from perches in open areas.

encyclopedia.title: Bruinvalk
encyclopedia.fact: Medium-sized bird of prey with brown plumage.

encyclopedia.title: Tortelduif
encyclopedia.fact: Small dove famous for its gentle call.

encyclopedia.title: Bosluisvoël
encyclopedia.fact: Feeds on ticks found on large mammals.

encyclopedia.title: Kiewiet
encyclopedia.fact: Ground-nesting bird known for its loud alarm calls.

encyclopedia.title: Europese byvreter
encyclopedia.fact: Colorful bird that catches insects in flight.

encyclopedia.title: Europese swawel
encyclopedia.fact: Migratory swallow that nests under roofs.
